name: N_RUTA -Artificial Intelligence VS Humankind
description:
You can win to artificial intelligence?
N_RUTA is action ball game!!
Hit the ball to the enemy!!

FEATURES:
- Clever artificial intelligence(AI)
- Beautiful and elegant game effects
- Rich gimmick
- More than 200 stage

Gimmicks:
- Speed-up
- Speed-down
- Pitfall
- Warp
- Obstacle
- Gimmick Switch and more...

BGM&SE
